comments:
To reproduce:
1. Create a global element
2. Create a new complex type
3. Using the menu invoke the Set Type -> Browse action
4. In the type selection dialog select the complex type from the list by double clicking on it. This will select the type and close the dialog.
7. The following stack trace is is written to the error log:

org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Widget is disposed

Note that using the OK button seems to work fine.
Unnecessary call to the run() method in widgetDefaultSelected
The OK button should be disabled if there is no selection
